sources.title: A Swiss Miss (1951)
sources.description: In the Swiss Alps, Mighty Mouse (aided by a dopey St. Bernard) must save the lovely Pearl Pureheart from the clutches of the dastardly Oil Can Harry. The villain has tied up Pearl and left her hanging from a mountain cliff. The St. Bernard tries to save everybody with brandy, but Mighty Mouse saves the day! Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/a-swiss-miss-1951/

metadata.Plot: While mountain climbing in the Swiss Alps, Oil Can Harry abducts Mighty Mouse's girlfriend, Pearl Pureheart and, once he's gained sufficient altitude, cuts the rope that tethers the fair maiden to the dastardly villain. After a Sa...
